38 //
39 // 4D quadrotor controls as a demo control type. All controls must support
40 // functions like min and max of different control variables.
41 //
43 
44 #ifndef FASTRACK_CONTROL_CONTROL_H
45 #define FASTRACK_CONTROL_CONTROL_H
46 
47 #include <fastrack/utils/types.h>
48 
49 namespace fastrack {
50 namespace control {
51 
52 struct QuadrotorControl {
53  // Pitch, roll, yaw rate, thrust.
54  double pitch;
55  double roll;
56  double yaw_rate;
57  double thrust;
58 
59  // Constructors and destructor.
60  ~QuadrotorControl() {}
61  explicit QuadrotorControl() {}
62  explicit QuadrotorControl(double p, double r, double yr, double t)
63  : pitch(p),
64  roll(r),
65  yaw_rate(yr),
66  thrust(t) {}
67 }; //\struct QuadrotorControl
68 
69 } //\namespace control
70 } //\namespace fastrack
71 
72 #endif
